stringified:
To Exponential | number,places | exponential | IMPLICIT | NONE
({ number, places }, { exponential }) =>
    exponential.next(number.toExponential(places))

original.description: Emits the specified number of decimal places of a number in exponential notation

places.description: Number of decimal places to format to

exponential.description: The number with the specified number of decimal places in exponential notation

alternativeMetaData: To Scientific Notation | num,dec | exp | IMPLICIT | NONE
